story:
Donation + art = investment + joy

Elena Vizerskaya is a true and unique artist on the verge of a major breakthrough. Her art is often described as STUNNING. Elena, aka Kassandra, is well known in Ukraine, her native country, and among photo art professionals around the world. Her main passion is photography, her works were exhibited around the world and won international awards, used for magazine covers and illustrations, apparel prints and advertising campaigns, still her graphic art is amazing in its own right.

Owning Elena's art is a double edged sword - it makes your life more beautiful and the art pieces' prices may grow significantly with time. It may become one of your prized possessions.

And this is the soul  and reason of this campaign - support Elena's artistic independence now and as our gratitude receive objects of her amazing art as something that may become a part of your nest egg.


Photo art market

Photo art gives us many joys and the best works are highly valued investments. Here's a list of some of the MOST EXPENSIVE PHOTOGRAPHS ever sold:

19 Most Expensive Photographs Ever Sold


What We Need & What You Get

Elena is fiercely independent. For many years she refuses to do any commercial orders, and this is how  she stayed true to her vision and able to experiment and create new unpredictable art. Collage, photo-manipulation, photo design are rather only the technical  features of Elena's approach, that allow her to create uncommon and even surrealistic world, perceived by spectator intuitively, on the emotional level. A space where many things meant to be felt, not understood, when you come back to it again and again.

Today Elena is embarking on a new quest, a part of which is creating a new type of a graphic novel, the world and adventures, which are based on photo art rather than drawings. The first results are mesmerizing, but because the process of creation involves actors, green screen facilities, travel, sophisticated lighting and many other production and post-production costs,  we aim to raise at least $44,000 to cover these costs of creating two very different graphic novels.

In recognition of your generous support we will provide a variety of perks listed here, which are much more than just perks - they are limited edition art pieces, which value may greatly appreciate with time, and still give you joy every time you and your loved ones look at them. What you will get as contributors to this campaign will be unique and you will belong to a small very special group of people who one day will be able to say: "I was among the first to recognize her art, while others passed by." Your contribution will not only be an act of good taste, but also, we believe, a good investment - there is a very realistic probability that these limited edition art pieces will become much much more expensive with time. 

To see all opportunities, please, scroll down until the very end ))

Levitazio Collection * List

All art objects of Levitazio Collection are Limited Edition items that gives them added value that may appreciate with time.

T-Shirts
Each elegantly tailored Levitazio-Piece-of-Art-T-Shirt features a large print of Elena's artwork and can be ordered from the following photo-chart as:
     1) Male or Female cut;
     2) In 3 sizes - Small, Medium and Large;
     3) With or without a preselected message (if any);
- just indicate the Number on the chart, male of female cut, the size and with or without a message (to this e-mail - eugene.e@septemberplanetstudios.com ).
FYI, the placement of Numbers and Messages in the photo-chart bellow is only for the convenience of ordering and will be different in actuality:

Calendars
There will be three types of Levitazio Calendar 2015-2016 (each one covering 2 years): Dark (with surreal dark art), Joyful (full of joy and mischief) and Sensual (for those who are not afraid of the erotic side of life) - just indicate in your order which one you want (to this e-mail - eugene.e@septemberplanetstudios.com ).
Each one of these Calendars will be printed as a Limited Edition in the total final amount of ordered calendars plus 99, each Calendar signed by Elena Vizerskaya.

Limited Edition Canvas Print
The artwork for the Limited Edition Canvas Print can be chosen from the list of images in the Portraits and T-Shirts section - just indicate in your order which one you want (to this e-mail - eugene.e@septemberplanetstudios.com ).

Books
Each Large Format Art Book will be full of Elena's Photo Art and Graphics - something far more than just a big gorgeous coffee table book. Its Limited Edition will be printed in the amount of orders plus 99. Each Art Book will be signed by Elena Vizerskaya personally to the name requested by the buyer.

Portraits
Those who will order Portraits are in for a real treat and adventure, for some of the most unusual portraits ever created. Here are a few examples of Elena's magic - an art in one of its purest unique forms:


Art Surprise!
Each Ultimate Art Collection order will have an Art Surprise issued as Extremely Limited Edition - meaning that each art object will be singularly unique, with no copies whatsoever. Even Elena herself will not have a copy of any of these Art Surprises.  This will be something absolutely unique only the buyer will possess.


    The Impact

    Your support of this campaign will allow Elena, an emerging artistic talent with limitless imagination and no fear, to do something that was never done before and that may change the way we see graphic novels and that may create a new genre - photo-art-graphic novel. 


    Risks & Challenges

    Creating these two photo-art-graphic novels will be very enjoyable, but hard and long work. It will take approximately a year to complete the work on these photo-art-graphic novels.

    If you donate, you will receive the first set of perks - in approximately 3 month after the start of this campaign, and the second set of perks - in approximately 6 month. All of them will be limited edition art pieces, some of them based on current Elena's artwork and some of them - on the new photo-art-graphic novels. See more detailed descriptions in the list of donations and perks.

    We cannot guarantee that these limited edition art pieces will become expensive art sold on auctions, but this is a very unique series of art pieces and the independence of Elena's spirit, her art experimentation and combustible unique talent can make that happen.  Whatever happens, you and your loved ones will be in possession of truly unique art giving you joy every time you look at it and that's priceless too.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some of you just can't contribute for whatever reason, but that doesn't mean you can't participate and help. Please, let your friends and family know about Elena Vizerskaya art and this IndieGoGo campaign! Make some noise! Let's make art history together!

      Thank you for reading )) Thank you for your attention!
story_txt:
Donation + art = investment + joy
 Elena Vizerskaya is a true and unique artist on the verge of a major breakthrough. Her art is often described as STUNNING. Elena, aka Kassandra, is well known in Ukraine, her native country, and among photo art professionals around the world. Her main passion is photography, her works were exhibited around the world and won international awards, used for magazine covers and illustrations, apparel prints and advertising campaigns, still her graphic art is amazing in its own right.

Owning Elena's art is a double edged sword - it makes your life more beautiful and the art pieces' prices may grow significantly with time. It may become one of your prized possessions. 
And this is the soul  and reason of this campaign - support Elena's artistic independence now and as our gratitude receive objects of her amazing art as something that may become a part of your nest egg. 


Photo art market
Photo art gives us many joys and the best works are highly valued investments. Here's a list of some of the MOST EXPENSIVE PHOTOGRAPHS ever sold:19 Most Expensive Photographs Ever Sold   
What We Need & What You Get Elena is fiercely independent. For many years she refuses to do any commercial orders, and this is how  she stayed true to her vision and able to experiment and create new unpredictable art. Collage, photo-manipulation, photo design are rather only the technical  features of Elena's approach, that allow her to create uncommon and even surrealistic world, perceived by spectator intuitively, on the emotional level. A space where many things meant to be felt, not understood, when you come back to it again and again.

Today Elena is embarking on a new quest, a part of which is creating a new type of a graphic novel, the world and adventures, which are based on photo art rather than drawings. The first results are mesmerizing, but because the process of creation involves actors, green screen facilities, travel, sophisticated lighting and many other production and post-production costs,  we aim to raise at least $44,000 to cover these costs of creating two very different graphic novels.
In recognition of your generous support we will provide a variety of perks listed here, which are much more than just perks - they are limited edition art pieces, which value may greatly appreciate with time, and still give you joy every time you and your loved ones look at them.
